bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for a Smart Transducer Interface for Sensors and Actuators
Transducer to Microprocessor Communication Protocols and Transducer Electronic Data Sheet (TEDS) Formats
IEEE Standard for a Smart Transducer Interface for Sensors and Actuators - Transducer to Microprocessor Communication Protocols and Transducer Electronic Data Sheet (TEDS) Formats

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A digital interface for connecting transducers to microprocessors is defined. A TEDS and its data formats are described. An electrical interface, read and write logic functions to access the TEDS and a wide variety of transducers are defined. This standard does not specify signal conditioning, signal conversion, or how the TEDS data is used in applications.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
